SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.config

Class DovecotConfig.AuthSocket

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.config.DovecotConfig.AuthSocket
Enclosing class:
DovecotConfig
public static class DovecotConfig.AuthSocket extends Object
Dovecot authentication socket configuration.

Holds paths to Dovecot authentication sockets for client (SASL mechanisms) and userdb (user existence checks).
